title: Biscotti with Cinnamon Sugar
ingredients: ['250g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '125g caster sugar', '90g butter', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg, beaten', '3 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon']
